assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: JRL has stock ownership in 23andMe and Lasergen, is a paid consultant for Regeneron, and a co-inventor on multiple United States and European patents related to molecular diagnostics for inherited neuropathies, eye diseases and bacterial genomic fingerprinting. Other authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
